summary: East Timor, officially the Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste, is a Southeast Asian country sharing the island of Timor with Indonesia. It gained independence in 2002 after a history of Portuguese colonization and Indonesian rule. The nation is known for its cultural diversity, influenced by Papuan and Austronesian peoples. With a population of over 1.34 million, it has a young demographic and a high fertility rate. The economy relies on natural resources and foreign aid. East Timor is a member of the Community of Portuguese Language Countries and has applied for ASEAN membership.
title: East Timor
